options.A: A. A type of learning where the model learns from labeled data.
options.B: B. A type of learning where the model learns from unlabeled data.

options.D: D. A type of learning where the model learns from semi-labeled data.

3. What is the primary goal of supervised learning?

options.A: A. To minimize error on the training data.
options.B: B. To maximize accuracy on the test data.
options.C: C. To generalize well on unseen data.
options.D: D. To memorize the training data.

question: 4. Which of the following tasks is NOT typically performed in supervised learning?

options.A: A. Feature engineering, model selection, training, evaluation
options.B: B. Data collection, feature selection, training, deployment
options.C: C. Data preprocessing, model training, testing, deployment
options.D: D. Feature extraction, model validation, testing, deployment
